en: End Tutorial
zh: 结束教程

en: You're ready to proceed.
zh: 你已经准备好了。

en: Welcome to the City of Circling.
zh: 欢迎来到盘旋城。

en: Click on your character to start moving.
zh: 点一下角色就能开始移动。

en: Move your mouse along tiles to plan a path, \nthen click the destination to confirm.
zh: 移动鼠标沿格子规划路径，点一下终点就能确认。

en: Each move takes 1 hour. Keep that in mind.
zh: 移动一次会消耗 1 小时，要留意哦。

en: Try stepping on that strange tile over there.
zh: 试着走到那个奇怪的格子上吧。

en: You got 1 Apple!\nNot sure what it's for yet...
zh: 获得了 1 个苹果。\n虽然不知道能用来做什么...

en: A citizen seems to need help.\nGo pay them a visit.
zh: 一位城民似乎需要帮助。\n拜访看看吧。

en: "I need 1 Apple and 1 Grapes, please!"
zh: “我想要 1 个苹果和 1 串葡萄，拜托了！”

en: Just 1 Grapes left to complete the request.
zh: 还差 1 串葡萄，就能完成委托。

en: That tile ahead might have some.\nGive it a try.
zh: 前面的格子或许可以抽到。\n试试看吧。

en: Got the fruit you needed!\nNow head back to deliver it.
zh: 抽到了需要的水果。\n现在回去交给城民吧。

en: "Thanks for the fruit! Here's 2 Exchange Coupons you can use at the shop."
zh: “感谢你的水果！送你 2 张交换券，可以在商店买东西用哦。”

en: By the way, unlike accepting requests,\nyou can deliver fruit just by passing by. No need to stop!
zh: 另外，不同于接受水果委托，\n提交水果不用停下脚步，路过城民时就会自动交付。

en: Another citizen has a request too? Go check it out.
zh: 另一位城民似乎也有请求？拜访看看吧。

en: "Could you deliver a message to the Giraffe for me? Please!"
zh: "可以麻烦帮我传个口信给长颈鹿吗？拜托了！”

en: "Thanks for the message! Here's 1 Exchange Coupon. Check out the shop nearby when you can."
zh: “感谢传信！给你 1 张交换券，有空的话去附近的商店看看吧。”

en: Besides fruit requests, you'll sometimes get message delivery requests.
zh: 除了水果，有时也会接到传信的委托。

en: Message deliveries complete automatically when you pass by too.\nUse this to save time!
zh: 传信任务路过目标也能自动完成。\n好好利用可以节省时间哦。

en: The shop is open! You can buy things with Exchange Coupons.\nTake a look.
zh: 商店开张了，可以用交换券买东西。\n进去看看吧。

en: Things are a bit pricey right now.\nHow about trying a Mystery Box?
zh: 现在商品有点贵。\n不如先买个盲盒碰碰运气？

en: You got 2 Fruits of your choice!\nClick the glowing fruit icons to pick the ones you want.
zh: 获得了 2 个自选水果。\n点击亮着的水果图标，挑你想要的吧。

en: The Upgrade Shop lets you unlock abilities with Upgrade Coupons.
zh: 升级商店里，可以用升级券解锁各种能力。

en: You don't have any Upgrade Coupons yet.\nComplete some requests first, then buy one at the shop.
zh: 现在还没有升级券呢。\n先努力完成委托，在商店里买 1 张吧。

en: You got 1 Trade Upgrade Coupon!\nVisit the Trade Upgrade Shop.
zh: 获得了 1 张贸易升级券。\n去贸易升级商店看看吧。

en: There are two upgrades available here.\nGet "Shop Refresh+" first.
zh: 目前这里有两种升级可选。\n先买“商店刷新+”吧。

en: Upgrade Shops usually sell Basic Upgrades and Special Upgrades.
zh: 升级商店通常会卖 基础升级 和 特殊升级。

en: Basic Upgrades can be bought multiple times, improving with each level.\nCheck the tooltip for current level and effects.
zh: 基础升级可以反复购买，等级和效果随之提升。\n可以在描述中查看当前等级和效果。

en: You just got "Shop Refresh+", so now you can manually refresh the shop.
zh: 刚刚买到的是 “商店刷新+”，现在可以手动刷新商店。

en: Except for the unlimited 3%s Mystery Boxes, other items go out of stock after purchase.
zh: 除了无限供应的 3%s 盲盒，其他商品买完都会暂时缺货。

en: The shop restocks at 00:00 / 08:00 / 16:00 daily with random goods, or when you manually refresh.
zh: 商店会在每天 00:00 / 08:00 / 16:00 上架随机商品，或者手动刷新时也会更新。

en: Manual refresh uses reset daily at 00:00.
zh: 手动刷新次数会在每日00:00重置。

en: When you're ready, head to the city gate to end the tutorial and start the real game!
zh: 准备妥当的话，就前往城门结束教程，正式开始游戏吧。
